name: @paths.design/caws-cli
description: CAWS CLI - Coding Agent Workflow System command line tools

scripts.dev: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist/ && node dist/index.js
scripts.test: npm run build && jest && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:unit: npm run build && jest && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:contract: npm run build && jest --testPathPatterns=contract && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && jest --testPathPatterns=integration && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:e2e:smoke: npm run build && jest --testPathPatterns=e2e && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:mutation: npm run build && jest --testPathPatterns=mutation && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:axe: npm run build && jest --testPathPatterns=axe && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.perf:budgets: npm run build && jest --testPathPatterns=perf && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist test-caws-project .agent && npm run test:cleanup

author: Paths Design <hello@paths.design>
